choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, and cashews
Here's your customized meal plan for the next week:

Day 1:
Breakfast - Oatmeal with berries and flaxseed
Lunch - Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables and chickpeas
Dinner - Baked fish with steamed broccoli and brown rice
Snacks - Apple slices with almond butter, banana smoothie without milk or yogurt (use water)

Day 2:
Breakfast - Egg scramble with spinach and mushrooms
Lunch - Veggie sandwich on gluten-free bread with avocado spread, roasted red pepper hummus
Dinner - Baked chicken breast with sweet potato fries and steamed kale
Snacks - Pistachios, carrot sticks with tahini dip

Day 3:
Breakfast - Oatmeal with berries and flaxseed (same as day 1)
Lunch - Veggie burger on a gluten-free bun with roasted red pepper hummus, side salad without honey vinaigrette dressing
Dinner - Grilled fish tacos with corn tortillas, black beans and salsa
Snacks - Apple slices with almond butter (same as day 1), banana smoothie without milk or yogurt (use water)

Day 4:
Breakfast - Egg scramble with spinach and mushrooms (same as day 2)
Lunch - Veggie burger on a gluten-free bun with roasted red pepper hummus, side salad without honey vinaigrette dressing (same as day 3)
Dinner - Baked chicken breast with sweet potato fries and steamed kale (same as day 2)
Snacks - Pistachios, carrot sticks with tahini dip (same as day 1), banana smoothie without milk or yogurt (use water)

Day 5:
Breakfast - Oatmeal with berries and flaxseed (same as day 4)
Lunch - Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables and chickpeas (same as day 1)
Dinner - Baked fish with steamed broccoli and brown rice (same as day 2)
Snacks - Apple slices with almond butter, banana smoothie without milk or yogurt (use water), pistachios (same as day 3)

Day 6:
Breakfast - Egg scramble with spinach and mushrooms (same as day 5)
Lunch - Veggie sandwich on gluten-free bread with avocado spread, roasted red pepper hummus (same as day 2)
Dinner - Baked chicken breast with sweet potato fries and steamed kale (same as day 1)
Snacks - Pistachios, carrot sticks with tahini dip (same as day 5), banana smoothie without milk or yogurt (use water)

Day 7:
Breakfast - Oatmeal with berries and flaxseed (same as day 6)
Lunch - Veggie burger on a gluten-free bun with roasted red pepper hummus, side salad without honey vinaigrette dressing (same as day 4)
Dinner - Grilled fish tacos with corn tortillas, black beans and salsa (same as day 3)
Snacks - Apple slices with almond butter, banana smoothie without milk or yogurt (use water), pistachios
